text: 1:5 Aposel 27:18-19; 27:38Ezɨ kurimɨn suighava an ingarir gumaziba atiatia aguava, vaghvagha akurvazim bagha uan asebar diava arai.1:5 Kurimɨn ingarir gumazibar aseba, mati en marvir guaba ko asɨzir nedaziba ko aser avɨrir maba uakan. Egha me kurim mɨghɨvghighasa, kurimɨn itir bizir maba isa ongarimɨn ada akuri. Dughiar kamnaghɨn, Jona kurimɨn dɨkɨnim giraghu, egha akuava ongani.
